sentences.en: "Let us pray," said the Methodist chaplain.
sentences.cn: “我们来祈祷吧，”那个循道宗牧师说。

sentences.en: Always with the chaplain is a soldier with obligations.
sentences.cn: 永远与士兵在一起是随军牧师的义务.

sentences.en: Chaplain 200 Casts Master level Bless, 1 x per day, 2 hour duration.
sentences.cn: 牧师200施展大师等级的祝福, 持续2小时,每天施展1次.

sentences.en: He acted both as the ship's surgeon and as chaplain for the men.
sentences.cn: 他在船上为水手们兼作外科医生和牧师。

sentences.en: He joined the 40th Division as an army chaplain.
sentences.cn: 他以随军牧师的身份加入第40师。

sentences.en: In the prison chapel, Lincoln gazes up at the chaplain.
sentences.cn: 在监狱的教堂里, 林肯凝视着牧师,倾听牧师的传教.

sentences.en: One might say I am a chaplain of shadows.
sentences.cn: 有人会讲我是阴魂的牧师.

sentences.en: She would swear the same, in a manner of speaking, before chaplain.'
sentences.cn: 可以说, 它就是在牧师面前也会照骂不误的. ”

sentences.en: Some Yankee chaplain would have written if this were true.
sentences.cn: 如果他真的死了,北方佬监狱里的牧师会写信的.

sentences.en: The chaplain came and preached to a packed church.
sentences.cn: 牧师来给挤满教堂的人们讲道.

sentences.en: The chaplain relished the privacy and isolation of his verdant surroundings.
sentences.cn: 牧师十分欣赏他那苍翠的环境所具有的幽雅恬静,与世隔绝的气氛.

sentences.en: The chaplain said the last rites.
The chaplain tried to solace the wounded and dying during the Battle.
sentences.cn: 在战斗中牧师安慰伤员和即将死去的人.

sentences.en: The chaplain tried toreform the criminal.
sentences.cn: 牧师试着去于那名罪犯改邪归正.

sentences.en: This Chaplain was a very young female with long blond hair.
sentences.cn: 这位牧师是一位非常年轻的女性,有著长长的金发.

words.tran_cn: 礼拜堂牧师之职位或任期

trans.tran_cn: （王宫等的）附属教堂牧师，（军队、医院、监狱等的）牧师，犹太教教士，（在社团等会议上）执行宗教仪式的牧师（或俗人）
trans.tran_en: a priest or other religious minister responsible for the religious needs of a club, the army, a hospital etc
